channel.title: CVE Feed for NextScripts -- NextScripts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NextScripts -- NextScripts

item.title: CVE-2024-37275|2024-07-22T13:27:12.252Z -- nextscripts -- nextscripts
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in NextScripts allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects NextScripts: from n/a through 4.4.6.
